Package com.intellij.tasks.impl

Class TaskUiUtil.RemoteFetchTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task
      • com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task.Backgroundable
        • com.intellij.tasks.impl.TaskUiUtil.RemoteFetchTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PerformInBackgroundOption, Progressive, TaskInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TaskUiUtil.ComboBoxUpdater
    Enclosing class:
    TaskUiUtil

    public abstract static class TaskUiUtil.RemoteFetchTask<T>
extends Task.Backgroundable
    Special kind of backgroundable task tailored to update UI in modal dialogs, which is very common for task repository editors in settings.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task
